snippet: Citigroup has named Peter Tague co-head of the bank's global mergers and acquisitions team, a promotion that comes as the bank's advisory business struggles to compete with those of other Wall Street giants.
abstract: Citigroup has named Peter Tague co-head of the bank's global mergers and acquisitions team, a promotion that comes as the bank's advisory business struggles to compete with those of other Wall Street giants.

headline.main: Citi Names Peter Tague Co-Head of Mergers
